note.p: Education: Studied in Edinburgh and at Trinity College, Dublin MD 1818; studied in Berlin, Gottingen, Vienna, Copenhagen, Paris and Italy (met JMW Turner during his travels)

Career: King's Professor, Trinity College, Dublin (1827); member of the 'Dublin School of Medicine'; appointed physician to the Meath Hospital (1821) and began to reform clinical practice; published 'Clinical Lectures on the Practice of Medicine' (1843)
Memberships: MRIA President 1843; Honorary Member of the Medical Societies of Berlin, Vienna, Hamburg, Tubingen, Bruges and Montreal
Notes: BR and DNB give birth date as 1796; Boase gives specific birth date of 27 Mar 1797
